name: Back To Somewhere
description:
Game made for movie game jam about getting back to somewhere, we all have to get to somewhere.

It's based off the one only back to the future.

All you have to do is maintain the speed at 88 to build up your future juice to get back to somewhere, but be warned if the delorean overheats or if it runs out of fuel that's game over man game over

Controls:

Z - Does alot :)

X - not so much :(
